attributes.contentHtml:
Everything Navo is claiming is false.
Nexal didn't even sell any server they were providing it for free.
But Nexal said they will provide paid from 25th of sept when they get better nodes.
I know once NavoNodes owner threaten one of my friend for ddos and he is a scammer as well.
Navo Owner He approached me to get server in his hosting. First he said he will give 6GB for coin farming then later he said 250 coins for it and when I farmed 400+ coins and asked for a server he banned me and refused to give me one.
NavoNodes Owner threaten me about jail as well.
He is scammer cuz he has a billing site with http Which is not even safe cuz for billing you meed https.
Once I needed members for my server and Navo Nodes Owner told me to write a fake review for his hosting for the shout out at front page and he would promote my server as well.

But Tbh Nexal Node is really good and fast.
DeadBush we sell ssl certificates I'm sure we can ssl our own site and it's approved by whmcs
DeadBush it's 50 coisn and we banned you for being disrespectful to staff
